docs.snippet: The House assembled this morning at 10 o'clook, and proceeded to business. The special order, being the third reading of bills, was postponed a while, only some sixty-five members being present.

docs.snippet: Before Justice Barnard.  The April term of this Court was opened yesterday morning, and the following Grand Jurors were impanneled:

headline.main: Proceedings in the Oyer and Terminer. COURT OF OYER AND TERMINER.

docs.lead_paragraph: Before Justice Barnard. The April term of this Court was opened yesterday morning, and the following Grand Jurors were impanneled:

docs.snippet: In the Senate, yesterday, among the bills passed was the one authorizing the Governor to appoint persons to take acknowledgments of deeds in Great Britain and France, and the one making an appropriation for the payment of the State's quota of the...
docs.lead_paragraph: In the Senate, yesterday, among the bills passed was the one authorizing the Governor to appoint persons to take acknowledgments of deeds in Great Britain and France, and the one making an appropriation for the payment of the State's quota of the direct tax to the National Government. The bill to provide for the examination of the accounts of the Treasurer and other State officers was made the special order for this evening.
